name: Mind Her Manor
storyline: Mind Her Manor is an action-adventure with management elements. Young Henrietta finds herself as the newest prisoner to be taken into the manor of Fay Shadowrend, the Matriarch of Witches. Fate seems to smile upon her as she is released from her cold cell, selected to do Fay's bidding. Free to wander the manor, Henrietta must find a way to escape Fay's clutches as she keeps her satisfied. She must hurry, however, as she has limited time to find a way out! Henrietta will encounter numerous characters, ferocious enemies, and perplexing puzzles as she works for her life!
summary: Action-adventure game with management elements where you play as a young fox trying to escape the manor of an evil witch.
